== Aws / EC2 ==
* [[Ec2Access|Allowing server access to users]]
* [http://www.the-tech-tutorial.com/?p=1408 Add Memory / Swap to any EC2 Instance]
{{{
sudo /bin/dd if=/dev/zero of=/var/swap.1 bs=1M count=1024
sudo /sbin/mkswap /var/swap.1
sudo /sbin/swapon /var/swap.1
}}}
